title: The All WOOD Gaming Setup!
tags: can you build a wooden pc
building a bc out of wood
can you buy a wood pc
description: Check out Grovemade and use our code LTT10 to get 10% off at:   Want to be notified of the Noctua Edition LTT Screwdriver launch? Sign up here:   We take a break from filling PC towers with RGB LEDs and take a more subtle approach to a Gaming PC. With simple lines, quiet cooling and beautiful solid wood accents, this rig looks great in any room!  Discuss on the forum:   Buy an Intel Core i9-13900k CPU:  Buy a MSI MPG Z790 Carbon WiFi Motherboard:  Buy a Sabrent Rocket 4 Plus-G 2TB NVMe M.2 SSD:  Buy an ASUS ROG Strix GeForce RTX 4090 OC Graphics Card:  Buy a Fractal Design North Mesh ATX Case:  Buy an EK Quantum Velocity Squared 1700 Lignum Edition - Walnut CPU Water Block:  Buy an EK CoolStream SE 240 Radiator:  Buy a Corsair RM1000x Shift PSU:  Buy an EK-HDC Lignum 12mm Compression Fitting - Walnut:  Buy an EK Quantum Kinetic FTL 80 D5 Pump/Reservoir:  Buy an EK Quantum Surface S360 Radiator:  Buy EK-HD PETG Tubing:  Buy a Cooler Master Universal Vertcal Graphics Card Holder V2:  Buy a Noctua NF-F12 iPPC-2000 PWM Cooling Fan:  Check out Walnut Keycaps on Etsy:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.   GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   EQUIPMENT WE USE TO FILM LTT:   OUR WAN PODCAST GEAR:   FOLLOW US  ---------------------------------------------------  Twitter:  Facebook:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Twitch:   MUSIC CREDIT --------------------------------------------------- Intro: Laszlo - Supernova Video Link:  iTunes Download Link:  Artist Link:   Outro: Approaching Nirvana - Sugar High Video Link:  Listen on Spotify:  Artist Link:   Intro animation by MBarek Abdelwassaa  Monitor And Keyboard by vadimmihalkevich / CC BY 4.0  Mechanical RGB Keyboard by BigBrotherECE / CC BY 4.0  Mouse Gamer free Model By Oscar Creativo / CC BY 4.0   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Intro 0:45 Some parts ain't wood 1:29 Wood CPU cooler 2:09 Motherboard & Friends 2:40 Case 3:33 VERY cool power supply 5:00 Wooden fittings! 6:00 Radiator & Fans 6:54 Watercooling begins! 7:53 THE WOOD GPU 10:10 Watercooling continues! 12:55 Turning it on 13:40 Wood Accessories & Peripherals 15:20 Outro
